item.title: [HeroCTF v4] - My Passwords (492)
[ESAIP CTF] - Baby Pwn (450)
item.description: Author : Rxphgui Nous allons aujourd’hui voir le premier challenge d’exploitation de binaire de l’ESAIP CTF. Il s’agissait d’un challenge d’introduction. Pourtant il avait moins de 10 solves. Nous n’avions simplement le binaire ainsi qu’un acc√®s remote. Introduction Pour commencer nous allons analyser le binaire de mani√®re assez simple : [raphgui@ret2arch:T√©l√©chargements/pwn]$ file babypwn (06-05 16:41) babypwn: ELF 64-bit LSB executable, x86-64, version 1 (GNU/Linux), statically linked, BuildID[sha1]=950806fb3e5df438288e966762b67e0c218467a5, for GNU/Linux 3.

item.title: [ESAIP CTF] - Find the Matrix (500)
item.description: Author : voiv0de The ESAIP CTF was overall a pretty cool event. Usually I take care of the Reverse Engineering challenges but on this one I returned to my first love : Cryptanalysis. During the CTF, I managed to obtain two first bloods in this category ü©∏. Today, I present to you : Find the Matrix. The flag was encrypted by this algorithm, find a way to reverse it to get the flag!

item.title: [ESAIP CTF] - Terminal Weather (479)
item.description: Author : Rxphgui Nous allons aujourd’hui voir le dernier challenge en pwn de l’ESAIP CTF. Nous n’avions pas de binaire simplement un remote. Lorsque nous nous connections nous avions cela : [raphgui@ret2arch:T√©l√©chargements/pwn][1]$ nc terminal-weather.esaip-cyber.com 55555 (06-05 17:00) Welcome to the Terminal Weather Service ----- MENU ----- 1. Change city 2. Get weather 3. Exit Choice: Introduction Ce challenge est celui qui m’a prit le plus de temps (2 heures). Pourtant le principe est simple, on va y venir.

item.title: [ESAIP CTF] - The Proof of the Malware (500)
item.description: Author : hashp4 Here is the writeup of The Proof of the Malware, a cool OSINT challenge categorized as medium during the ESAIP CTF. After some time without anybody solving the challenge I managed to first blood itü©∏. Instructions : We have discovered that a person currently working at Metacortexxs is developing a powerful virus. Find the proof of the development of this virus by this employee Information Gathering - Finding the target According to the instructions, we are searching for someone who is working at Metacortexxs.
